message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!

I appreciate your initial offer, but I think a 60-40 split in my favor is a more balanced reflection of our roles in this game.  Let's be fair, but also remember that the money is depreciating with each round!
Considering the depreciation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I should get the bigger share since I made the first offer.
